comment: bumbpy in the beginning. still kind of rough to the end. if you like to 'not' show up to class, go ahead and drop. attendance ES MOY IMPORTANTE! also, he whispers his lectures so sit up front.

Very unclear about any suggestions. When asked for elaboration could simply states that elaboration is "not important." Also, had a lot of trouble with establishing requirements. Then complained when too many were presented!
If you want to learn anything about architecture DO NOT TAKE THIS MAN!!!!

Super class, excellent professor. He expects high quality work and in return you will get high quality education.  Much more interested in student progress/performance than other Arch prof's I've taken at SPSU.
Very very bad. Could not teach way out of a paper bag.

Very unhelpfull,quite confusing at times. Ok as a person, poor performance as a professor. Need to retire and let others more entusiastic and better prepared to teach. If you take his class you are on your own!!

The accelerated class takes up ALL of your time!  Smart man but plays favoerites so you better get on his good side. Doesn't explain concepts so you have to go to others in the class for help. The projects are VERY abstract and the jurors don't understand them. Its either his way or you fail!
